entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
